name: Kaya
headline: Marketing agency for startups: 10x cheaper, better and faster
description:
Kaya is on a mission to help businesses achieve rapid growth through digital advertising. With our cutting-edge technology and experienced marketers, we deliver ad campaigns 10x cheaper, better and faster than traditional agencies. In less than a year, we’ve helped 120+ businesses achieve multiple fold growth on their ad campaigns, without the steep fees typically associated with high-quality marketing services.

Check out what some of our customers have to say here: usekaya.com/reviews

#  The startup marketing agency that delivers 10x better ROI
With our cutting-edge technology and experienced marketers, we can deliver your campaigns 10x cheaper, better and faster than traditional agencies. No minimum spend. 
[ Get free proposal ](https://www.usekaya.com/<https:/app.usekaya.com/start-proposal>)
##  Join the founders from fast-growing startups

## Your ready-made growth engine
Building a full-stack marketing function takes years. Kaya delivers a seasoned team and marketing analytics from the get-go, saving you significant time and money. 
### We manage your campaigns end-to-end
Our elite team handles every aspect of your campaigns, from strategy through to optimization. And we get them done fast.
  * [![Google ads logo](https://www.usekaya.com/_nuxt/logo-google.BubGnZZH.png)Google Ads](https://www.usekaya.com/</launch/google-ads>)
  * [![Meta ads logo](https://www.usekaya.com/)Meta Ads](https://www.usekaya.com/</launch/meta-ads>)
  * [![LinkedIn ads logo](https://www.usekaya.com/)LinkedIn Ads](https://www.usekaya.com/</launch/linkedin-ads>)
  * [![YouTube ads logo](https://www.usekaya.com/)YouTube Ads](https://www.usekaya.com/</launch/youtube-ads>)
  * [![TikTok ads logo](https://www.usekaya.com/)TikTok Ads](https://www.usekaya.com/</launch/tiktok-ads>)


### Expertise at your fingertips
We're YC founders ourselves and our team has years of experience working with the world's fastest growing startups.
![visual representation of integration between five brands, including MoneyLion, Y Combinator, Uber, and Revolut, connected to a central platform representing Kaya, illustrating collaboration or data pipeline flow.](https://www.usekaya.com/_nuxt/home-team.HSUy5b5m.png)
### Supercharged with AI
Our proprietary AI offers smart recommendations, helping our marketers deliver exceptional work 10 times faster.
![Client profile generator illustrating business-focused insights, including potential ideal customer profiles \(ICPs\), with a sleek, user-friendly interface emphasizing tailored marketing recommendations.](https://www.usekaya.com/_nuxt/coin-icps.Mn5i0irO.webp)
### Marketing analytics you don’t need to build
Get access to dashboards and alerts that uncover insights you need to maximise growth and ROI.
![data dashboard showing campaign performance, revenue breakdown by channel, daily visitors, signups trend, and campaign funnel, ideal for tracking marketing metrics and analyzing user acquisition strategies.](https://www.usekaya.com/_nuxt/home-analytics.DVfEhL-X.png)
![Zapier logo](https://www.datocms-assets.com/147255/1734180914-frame-8578.png)
AI-specialist agency run by a small group of incredible marketers with really deep expertise who know how to train the models, train the agents to actually automate a bunch of customers work.

##  FAQ 
### Will we need to integrate any new tools on our end?
    
We handle all the heavy lifting when it comes to tool integration. To ensure your campaigns perform at their best, we’ll set up analytics and conversion tracking—like Google Analytics and ad platform pixels — at no extra charge.
Our goal is to keep things simple and seamless for you.
### Do we need tracking set up, or will you do that for us? 
    
Conversion tracking is essential for your ad campaigns to succeed. At Kaya, we take care of setting up tracking at no extra charge — it’s part of our commitment to delivering high-performing campaigns. 
Our team ensures all tracking is implemented seamlessly, so you get clear, actionable data to optimize your ads and grow your business. 
### Will you help me with my landing pages? 
    
Absolutely. We will provide you with the landing page copy and mockup that aligns with your growth objectives and conversion goals. 
### Do you create the creatives for the ads?
    
That depends on what works best for your team.
At Kaya, we specialize in creating both ad copy and creatives for most of our growth partners. We start by understanding your branding, target audience, and unique value propositions. From there, we craft a variety of ad variations optimized for performance, leveraging our extensive experience in paid advertising.
You’ll always have final approval on every ad we run and complete transparency into the campaigns, so you stay in control while we do the heavy lifting.
For teams with in-house designers who prefer to handle the creatives themselves, we totally get it. We can collaborate by providing a detailed creative brief, ensuring your team has all the guidance needed to align with our proven strategies for success.
Ready to let Kaya take your ads to the next level? [Get your free proposal](https://www.usekaya.com/<https:/app.usekaya.com/start-proposal>).
### What if I don’t like the quality of the work?
    
After filling up the request form, you’ll receive a proposal which outlines the details of the services we can offer, including the strategies and tactics that we will use to help you achieve your marketing goals.‍
After receiving the free proposal, you can review it and decide whether you would like to proceed with our services, or ask for revisions (as many as you'd want). If you are happy with the proposal, we can then proceed with the setup of your ad campaigns.
### Is there any obligation to proceed with your services after receiving the proposal?
    
No, there is no obligation to proceed with our services after receiving the proposal. You are free to review the proposal, then make a decision based on your own needs and preferences.
### How does your service help businesses find their product-channel fit faster?
    
Our service helps customers to find their product-channel fit faster by allowing them to easily experiment and acquire users through any marketing channels they choose. With our cutting-edge technology and experienced marketers, we can launch marketing campaigns rapidly and help you assess the channels that work best for your business.‍

We handle all the heavy lifting when it comes to tool integration. To ensure your campaigns perform at their best, we’ll set up analytics and conversion tracking—like Google Analytics and ad platform pixels — at no extra charge.
Our goal is to keep things simple and seamless for you.
### Do we need tracking set up, or will you do that for us? 
    
Conversion tracking is essential for your ad campaigns to succeed. At Kaya, we take care of setting up tracking at no extra charge — it’s part of our commitment to delivering high-performing campaigns. 
Our team ensures all tracking is implemented seamlessly, so you get clear, actionable data to optimize your ads and grow your business. 
### Will you help me with my landing pages? 
    
Absolutely. We will provide you with the landing page copy and mockup that aligns with your growth objectives and conversion goals. 
### Do you create the creatives for the ads?
    
That depends on what works best for your team.
At Kaya, we specialize in creating both ad copy and creatives for most of our growth partners. We start by understanding your branding, target audience, and unique value propositions. From there, we craft a variety of ad variations optimized for performance, leveraging our extensive experience in paid advertising.
You’ll always have final approval on every ad we run and complete transparency into the campaigns, so you stay in control while we do the heavy lifting.
For teams with in-house designers who prefer to handle the creatives themselves, we totally get it. We can collaborate by providing a detailed creative brief, ensuring your team has all the guidance needed to align with our proven strategies for success.
Ready to let Kaya take your ads to the next level? Get your free proposal⟨7⟩.
### What if I don’t like the quality of the work?
    
After filling up the request form, you’ll receive a proposal which outlines the details of the services we can offer, including the strategies and tactics that we will use to help you achieve your marketing goals.‍
After receiving the free proposal, you can review it and decide whether you would like to proceed with our services, or ask for revisions (as many as you'd want). If you are happy with the proposal, we can then proceed with the setup of your ad campaigns.
### Is there any obligation to proceed with your services after receiving the proposal?
    
No, there is no obligation to proceed with our services after receiving the proposal. You are free to review the proposal, then make a decision based on your own needs and preferences.
### How does your service help businesses find their product-channel fit faster?
    
Our service helps customers to find their product-channel fit faster by allowing them to easily experiment and acquire users through any marketing channels they choose. With our cutting-edge technology and experienced marketers, we can launch marketing campaigns rapidly and help you assess the channels that work best for your business.‍
## Break free from traditional agencies & freelancers
Frustrated by slow agencies and rigid contracts? Kaya is built differently— fast, transparent, and growth-focused. Fill out a quick form, and we’ll deliver a tailored plan in 3 days to accelerate your startup’s growth.
Get free proposal⟨7⟩

### Kaya: The Startup Marketing Agency Disrupting the Landscape

**Overview:**
Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, Kaya is a UK-based marketing agency that’s laser-focused on serving startups. They’ve rapidly made a name for themselves by offering digital advertising services that claim to be 10x cheaper, faster, and better than traditional agencies.

**Mission:**
Kaya’s mission revolves around propelling businesses to rapid growth through innovative digital marketing strategies. They leverage cutting-edge technology combined with a team of seasoned marketers to craft and execute ad campaigns that deliver impactful results without the exorbitant fees typically associated with high-quality marketing services.

**What They Do:**
Kaya specializes in:
- **Ads Management:** Across platforms like Google, Meta, YouTube, LinkedIn, and TikTok.
- **Competitor Ad Intelligence:** Providing insights on how competitors are managing their ads.
- **Comprehensive Marketing Analytics:** Offering dashboards and alerts that provide crucial data to maximize growth and ROI.

Their emphasis on agility means they can manage campaigns end-to-end, from strategy formation to optimization, all within a two-week turnaround—a stark contrast to the months-long processes of traditional agencies.

**Team and Location:**
Hailing from London, Kaya operates with a tight team of five. This lean structure allows them to remain agile and responsive, creating solutions tailored to their client's specific needs. Their group partner, Nan, adds to their collaborative strength.

**Customer Success:**
In less than a year, Kaya has assisted over 150 businesses, effectively managing around $20 million in ad spend. Clients have celebrated their ability to achieve noteworthy results, such as:
- **Vault:** 10x return on ad spend (ROAS) while doubling their budget.
- **Hona Care:** A 62% increase in leads and a 64% reduction in costs within three weeks.

Testimonials are abundant, with many clients praising Kaya for its speed, transparency, and effectiveness—a rare combination that provides a distinct edge in the often convoluted world of marketing.

**Technology and Approach:**
Kaya prides itself on its proprietary AI technology that streamlines the ad management process, ensuring faster and smarter execution. This tech backbone allows them to discover insights promptly, adapting strategies based on real-time data to enhance performance.

**Why Choose Kaya:**
Startups benefit from Kaya's unique positioning:
- **Cost Efficiency:** Starting as low as $3,000/month without minimum spends, it's an attractive option for lean teams.
- **Speed:** Campaigns can be up and running in as little as two weeks.
- **Low Risk:** With no long-term contracts, clients can explore working together without being locked in.
- **Transparency:** Regular performance updates ensure clients are kept in the loop.

In summary, Kaya is more than just a marketing agency; it’s a growth partner for startups that want to break free from the shackles of traditional marketing methods. They bring a powerful blend of technology, expertise, and an agile approach to deliver results that are hard to argue with. If you’re looking to take your marketing to the next level without the usual headaches, Kaya might just be the solution you need. To learn more or get a free proposal, check out their website at [usekaya.com](https://www.usekaya.com).
